special_text:
Stations you control have “{T}: Put a loyalty counter on each planeswalker you control.”
[0]: Untap up to one target Station you control. It becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with hexproof and vigilance until your next turn. It's still a land.
[-3]: Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You may cast a spell from your hand with mana value less than or equal to the number of Stations you control without paying it's mana cost.
[-5]: You get an emblem with “You may activate loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant.”
